Iam: I am Front-End, Back-End and Mobile developer
introduction: I'm a software developer with experience in TypeScript and JavaScript, and experience in frameworks like React, Laravel, Django and React Native. A fast learner, I'm passionate about creating scalable, easy-to-use software that solves real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life! I am 22 years old, I am the father of 2 boys that I love very much, Jonathan Edwards, 5 years old and Charles Haddon, 1 year old. I am married to an Argentinian called Mirian Mabel. In my spare time I like to read, enjoy with my family, go to the beach, surf, I love watching football (Go Broncos!).
frontEnd: Front-End Developer: React, Next.Js and Vue
